data.actual_result: Report option is visible and opens the report UI if clicked, however gets stuck in an infinite load loop (can be exited)
data.expected_result: No report option is available since Clyde is only a client side message
data.short_description: You can open the UI to report messages by Clyde
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure you have the report experiment enabled (this report can't be reproduced without it) - Invoke Clyde somehow (e.g. sending a message to someone that has you blocked, setting your nickname via /nick, etc.) - Right click the message Clyde throws
